document.full_text: china and other emerging nations such as brazil and india are becoming leaders in science to rival traditional "scientific superpowers" like the united states, europe and japan, a top british academy said on monday.
document.title: china leads challenge to "scientific superpowers"
lines_and_colors: china and other emerging nations such as brazil and india are becoming leaders in science to rival traditional "scientific superpowers" like the united states, europe and japan, a top british academy said on monday.
